issue.title: rename vector module to arrow-vector for consistency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-279](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-279). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
currently the jave project has the following modules:
- arrow-format
- arrow-memory
- vector
